topic.title: Change bucket settings
topic.shortdesc: Bucket settings can be edited later using the Change Bucket Settings option.

ol.li:
Select
>Data Buckets (blue triangle preceeding the bucket name)
.

Click on the Edit button.
The Configure Bucket dialog offers the same options as the Create a New Bucket dialog.

body.p: You can change bucket setting also with the CLI command bucket-edit or the REST command rest-bucket-parameters.
